title: 186 Kata Ka Abedo Gi Ngima Maber

lines: 1. Kata ka abedo gi ngima maber,kata ka ayudo chandruok;Kata abet nade, imiya ng`eyo,Kuomi to anyalo bet gi kuwe.
Anyalo, bet gi kuwe;Anyalo, bet gi kuwe e chunya.
2. Kata Satan sanda, kayudo temruok;Wach mojiwo chunya e ma;Kristo oseng`eyo yomna duto te,Ne otho ni mond` ores chunya.
3. Amor koro nikech richona dutoogur, e msalaba mare;Noting`o keth duto, oresa chutho;Adendo nying Yesu ma Jawar.
4. Ruoth Yesu, ru ndalono mar bironi,Ma wanawinj dwond tung` machienkaneni kibiro e boche poloAnabedi gi kuwe e chunya.
